text: Also he built towers in the desert, and digged many wells: for he had much cattle, both in the low country, and in the plains: husbandmen also, and vine dressers in the mountains, and in Carmel: for he loved husbandry.26.10 diggedâ€¦: or, cut out many cisterns26.10 Carmel: or, fruitful fields26.10 husbandry: Heb. ground
